mapper.select: select a.userid, uname, count(a.userid) as count from programs as a, userinfo as b where a.userid = b.userid group by a.userid order by count DESC

select count(flenth) as count, '小于四分钟' as lenth from programs where flenth between '00:00:01' and '00:03:00' union select count(flenth) as count, '四到五分钟' as lenth from programs where flenth between '00:03:00' and '00:04:00' union select count(flenth) as count, '大于五分钟' as lenth from programs where flenth > '00:04:00'

select count(ispublic) as count, 2 as ispublic from programs union select count(ispublic) as count, ispublic from programs where ispublic = 1 union select count(ispublic) as count, ispublic from programs where ispublic = 0
select Ptp, count(Ptp) as count from pro_list group by Ptp
